name: TMA-HD Wireless
details: A high-quality wireless headset with noise-canceling technology and ergonomic design for long listening sessions.

reviews.comment: Amazing sound quality and super comfortable to wear!
Great features, but the battery life could be longer.
Good noise-canceling and comfort, but a bit bulky for everyday use.

name: TMA-2 Comfort Wireless
details: Over-ear headphones designed for ultimate comfort, featuring premium sound and long-lasting battery.

reviews.comment: Perfect for studio use, with crystal-clear audio.
Good build quality, but a bit heavy for outdoor use.
Excellent sound quality, but they feel a bit too tight on the head after long sessions.
